item.description:
Are you shy about coming to a Tantra workshop?  Are you a total beginner and don't really know where to start? Are you curious but a bit....scared?

 

Well, you've come to the right place!  You are cordially (gently and lovingly) invited to this workshop designed ESPECIALLY FOR YOU! (I love things that are designed especially for me!)

 

We will delve in slowly.  We will start at the very beginning (a very good place to start.)  We will explore Tantra - it's roots along with what's happening now in the west.

 

I will provide you with an experience of Tantra that you can approach at your own pace, in your own time.  And, you are always at choice (in all workshops.)

 

In a partnership and trying to figure out whether Tantra is for you or not?  This workshop will help you begin to answer that question!

 

Single and wondering if Tantra is for you? Unfortunately there are many people out there who think Tantra is only for couples!  I'm here to say absolutely NOT!  I will teach you the very foundational practices - whether you are single or partnered - you will benefit from knowing them.

 

You will leave feeling lighter, happier and more joyful!

 

For questions, please email me - Robyn@SacredTantricFire.com

 

**And please note $47 is pay in advance; the price at the door will be $50.  I encourage you to save money and pay ahead of time!
item.name: Shy About Tantra
